item.title: How to install Nginx on Ubuntu Server
item.description:
Introduction

Nginx is one of the most popular web servers in the world and is responsible for hosting some of the largest and highest-traffic sites on the internet. It is a lightweight choice that can be used as either a web server or reverse proxy.

In this guide, weâ€™ll discuss how to install Nginx on your Ubuntu server, adjust the firewall, manage the Nginx process, and set up server blocks for hosting more than one domain from a single server.
